switch.title: Remote ADB debugging
switch.desc: Turn on the network debugging port of the device to facilitate developers to connect to the computer without a data cable, never turn on this option in a public WIFI network environment!

switch.title: Hide error pop-ups
switch.desc: Don't show app crashes and unresponsive pop-ups

switch.title: Always show the crash dialog
switch.desc: Show dialog box every time the application crashes

switch.title: Show background application not responding
switch.desc: Display the "Application Not Responding (ANR)" dialog for background applications

switch.title: Display touch feedback
switch.desc: Small dots are displayed when touching the screen

picker.title: Sandbox mechanism
picker.desc: With sandboxing on, all applications will not be able to access the native storage root (and not just those with TargetAPI >= Q)
picker.set: if [[ $state ]]; then echo 'Device will reboot in 5 seconds~' sleep 5 sm set-isolated-storage $state fi
